## New workbook ---

Intune/Endpoint Manager Device ID Reference - based on the Intune DeviceType Reference for Azure Sentinel KQL blog post.

links.linkLabel: Intune DeviceType Reference for Azure Sentinel KQL

content.json:
DeviceTypeNameDescription
0DesktopWindows Desktop device
1WindowsRTWindowsRT device

100BlackberryBlackberry Device
101PalmPalm device
